yán along

yánzhù along

traditional: 軌道
guǐdào orbit; railway or tram line; fig. conventional way of thinking
xuèyè blood
chūntiān spring (season)

traditional: 出賣
chūmài to sell (off); fig. to betray
zhuīqiú to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly; to seek after; to woo

traditional: 平時
píngshí in normal times; in peacetime
yǎnzòu to play a musical instrument; to perform music

traditional: 交點
jiāodiǎn meeting point; point of intersection

traditional: 化學反應
huàxuéfǎnyìng chemical reaction
guǎnzi tube; pipe; drinking straw

traditional: 高於
gāoyú greater than; to exceed

shúxī to be familiar with; to know well
